DNA strand mutations are purged from the race morphogenetic imprint in the Sphere of Amenti and the strand imprint is realigned with the 12 strand DNA pattern by the successive births of the 6 Silent Ascension Avatars. Transmission of the corrected DNA strand imprints through Earth’s grid allows a reverse-mutation of various ascension-inhibiting human genetic distortions to take place. Earth's 7 Primary Vortices open only during the two ascension cycles, at the beginning and end of a 26,556-year Harmonic Universe Euiago time cycle, The energetic dynamics that Earth now approaches, as it enters the ½ cycle point in its 2 nd ascension cycle, are unprecedented within the annals of recorded human history. The coming of these events has been symbolically foretold through oral and written tradition for thousands of years. ©2002 Ashayana Deane 437
